TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProgressBarRenderer extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides methods used to render a progress bar control with visual styles. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer>類別提供一組`static`可以用來呈現使用作業系統的目前視覺化樣式的進度列控制項的方法。 呈現控制項是指繪製控制項的使用者介面。 這非常有用，如果要繪製自訂控制項應該具有目前視覺化樣式的外觀。 若要繪製進度列，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawHorizontalBar%2A>或是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawVerticalBar%2A>方法來繪製的空白列，然後再使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawHorizontalChunks%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawVerticalChunks%2A>方法來繪製填滿的列中的項目。
如果作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至應用程式視窗的工作區，這個類別的方法將會繪製目前視覺化樣式的進度列。 否則，方法和屬性，這個類別會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。 若要判斷是否可以使用這個類別的成員，您可以檢查的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性。
這個類別會包裝的功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=nameWithType>設定為其中一個所公開的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ProgressBar.Bar?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ProgressBar.BarVertical?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ProgressBar.Chunk?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ProgressBar.ChunkVertical?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <<c0> [ 呈現具有視覺化樣式的控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立使用自訂控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawVerticalBar%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawVerticalChunks%2A>方法來繪製垂直進度列。 控制項使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer>每秒重繪新增的片段進度列。 `SetupProgressBar`方法會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.ChunkThickness%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.ChunkSpaceThickness%2A>; 屬性來計算每個繪製的過大矩形的高度。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static int ChunkSpaceThickness { get; }
.property int32 ChunkSpaceThickness
Public Shared ReadOnly Property ChunkSpaceThickness As Integer
public: static property int ChunkSpaceThickness { int get(); };
member this.ChunkSpaceThickness : int

Docs.summary: Gets the width, in pixels, of the space between each inner piece of the progress bar.
Docs.value: 像素為單位，進度列的每一個內部片段之間的間距寬度。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個值取決於作業系統的目前視覺化樣式。
之前存取這個屬性，您應該確認<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性會傳回`true`。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.ChunkSpaceThickness%2A>屬性來判斷每個矩形，表示所繪製的進度列遞增的大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawVerticalChunks%2A>方法。 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer>類別。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#4)]

Docs.exception: The operating system does not support visual styles. -or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system. -or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int ChunkThickness { get; }
.property int32 ChunkThickness
Public Shared ReadOnly Property ChunkThickness As Integer
public: static property int ChunkThickness { int get(); };
member this.ChunkThickness : int

Docs.summary: Gets the width, in pixels, of a single inner piece of the progress bar.
Docs.value: 寬度，單位為像素的進度列的一個內部片段。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個值取決於作業系統的目前視覺化樣式。
之前存取這個屬性，您應該確認<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性會傳回`true`。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.ChunkThickness%2A>屬性來判斷每個矩形，表示所繪製的進度列遞增的大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawVerticalChunks%2A>方法。 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer>類別。

Docs.exception: The operating system does not support visual styles. -or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system. -or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前使用此方法，您應該確認<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性會傳回`true`。

The that specifies the bounds to be filled by progress bar pieces.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法所繪製每個進度列片段跨越的高度`bounds`參數。 繪製進度列片段的數目取決於寬度`bounds`和所傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.ChunkSpaceThickness%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.ChunkThickness%2A>屬性。
之前使用此方法，您應該確認<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性會傳回`true`。

Docs.exception: The operating system does not support visual styles. -or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system. -or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

remarks.format:

## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawVerticalBar%2A>自訂控制項的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>方法來繪製空的進度列。 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer>類別。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法所繪製每個進度列片段跨過寬度`bounds`參數。 繪製進度列片段的數目取決於高度`bounds`和所傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.ChunkSpaceThickness%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.ChunkThickness%2A>。
之前使用此方法，您應該確認<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性會傳回`true`。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawVerticalChunks%2A>方法中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer.Tick?displayProperty=nameWithType>繪製進度列的每個增量的事件處理常式。 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer>類別。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsSupported { get; }
.property bool IsSupported
Public Shared ReadOnly Property IsSupported As Boolean
public: static property bool IsSupported { bool get(); };
member this.IsSupported : bool

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the class can be used to draw a progress bar control with visual styles.
Docs.value: 如果使用者已經啟用視覺化樣式，在作業系統中和視覺化樣式套用至視窗的工作區的應用程式;否則， 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果這個屬性是`false`，此類別的屬性與方法會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性來判斷是否要呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawVerticalBar%2A>方法。 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer>類別。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#2)]
